name: Dan_Luhrman
text:
Dan Luhrman
Lieutenant Dan Luhrman was an AAF officer who reported a UFO sighting on September 4, 1947.
Approximately ten minutes into his patrol, Luhrman spotted an unidentified object and pursued it in order to identify it. However, the object managed to evade Luhrman, who then returned to base.
The Air Force later released a statement that the object Luhrman had chased was merely a weather balloon.
